mapper.select: SELECT * FROM FESTIVAL WHERE TITLE LIKE '%'||#{s_keyword}||'%'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO PRODUCT( PRODUCT_SEQ,ID,TITLE,SUBTITLE,CONTENT, PCOUNT,PRICE, PLACE,THUMBNAIL,FSEQ, WDATE,DEL,TNAME, PPOINT,HCOUNT) VALUES( SEQ_PRODUCT.NEXTVAL,#{id},#{title},#{subtitle},#{content}, #{pcount},#{price}, #{place},#{thumbNail},#{fseq}, SYSDATE,0,'PRODUCT', 0,0)
mapper.update: UPDATE PRODUCT SET TITLE=#{title}, SUBTITLE=#{subtitle}, CONTENT=#{content}, PCOUNT=#{pcount}, PRICE=#{price}, PLACE=#{place}, THUMBNAIL=#{thumbNail}, FSEQ=#{fseq} WHERE PRODUCT_SEQ=#{product_seq}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO FILEPDS( SEQ,PSEQ,FILENAMEBF,FILENAMEAF,TNAME) VALUES( SEQ_FILEPDS.NEXTVAL,(SELECT MAX(PRODUCT_SEQ) FROM PRODUCT), #{fileNameBf}, #{fileNameAf}, 'PRODUCT')
INSERT INTO FILEPDS( SEQ,PSEQ,FILENAMEBF,FILENAMEAF,TNAME) VALUES( SEQ_FILEPDS.NEXTVAL,(SELECT MAX(GOODS_SEQ) FROM GOODS), #{fileNameBf}, #{fileNameAf}, #{tname})
mapper.select:
SELECT * FROM ( SELECT * FROM ( SELECT PRODUCT_SEQ,ID,TITLE,SUBTITLE,CONTENT,PCOUNT,PRICE,PLACE,THUMBNAIL,FSEQ,WDATE,DEL,TNAME,PPOINT,HCOUNT FROM PRODUCT WHERE 1=1
AND TITLE LIKE '%'||#{findWord}||'%'
ORDER BY PRODUCT_SEQ ASC)
WHERE ROWNUM<=#{startNum}
ORDER BY PRODUCT_SEQ DESC)
WHERE ROWNUM<=#{countPerPage}
ORDER BY PRODUCT_SEQ DESC

SELECT NVL(COUNT(*),0) AS CNT FROM PRODUCT WHERE 1=1
AND TITLE LIKE '%'||#{findWord}||'%'
ORDER BY PRODUCT_SEQ DESC
SELECT * FROM FILEPDS WHERE TNAME='PRODUCT' AND PSEQ=#{product_seq}

SELECT C.CART_SEQ,C.ID,C.PSEQ,C.GSEQ,C.MYCOUNT,C.OSEQ,TITLE,CONTENT,THUMBNAIL,PCOUNT,WDATE,P.DEL,FSEQ,PLACE,PRICE,TNAME,PPOINT,HCOUNT FROM CART C, PRODUCT P WHERE C.PSEQ = P.PRODUCT_SEQ AND C.ID=#{id} AND OSEQ=0

SELECT C.CART_SEQ,C.ID,C.PSEQ,C.GSEQ,C.MYCOUNT,OSEQ,TITLE,CONTENT,THUMBNAIL,PCOUNT,WDATE,P.DEL,FSEQ,PLACE,PRICE,TNAME,PPOINT,HCOUNT FROM CART C, PRODUCT P WHERE C.PSEQ = P.PRODUCT_SEQ AND C.CART_SEQ = #{cart_seq}
mapper.insert:
SELECT SEQ_ORDERED.NEXTVAL AS ordered_seq FROM DUAL
INSERT INTO ORDERED ( ORDERED_SEQ,OID,ONAME,OPHONE,OADDRESS,ODATE,OTPRICE,OMID) VALUES ( SEQ_ORDERED.CURRVAL,#{oid},#{oname},#{ophone},#{oaddress},SYSDATE,#{otprice},#{omid})
INSERT INTO REPLY( SEQ,PSEQ,TNAME,ID, CONTENT,REF,STEP, WDATE,DEL,LOCK_) VALUES( SEQ_REP.NEXTVAL,#{pseq},'PRODUCT',#{id}, #{content},SEQ_REP.CURRVAL,0, SYSDATE,0,0)
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM REPLY ORDER BY REF ASC, STEP ASC

SELECT O.ORDERED_SEQ, O.OID, O.ONAME, O.OPHONE, O.OADDRESS, O.ODATE, O.OTPRICE, O.OMID, C.CART_SEQ, C.PSEQ, C.GSEQ, C.MYCOUNT, C.OSEQ, P.PRODUCT_SEQ, P.TITLE, P.SUBTITLE, P.CONTENT, P.PCOUNT, P.PRICE, P.PLACE, P.THUMBNAIL, P.FSEQ, P.WDATE, P.DEL, P.TNAME, P.PPOINT, P.HCOUNT FROM ORDERED O, CART C, PRODUCT P WHERE O.ORDERED_SEQ = C.OSEQ AND C.PSEQ = P.PRODUCT_SEQ AND O.OID=#{id}

SELECT O.ORDERED_SEQ, O.OID, O.ONAME, O.OPHONE, O.OADDRESS, O.ODATE, O.OTPRICE, O.OMID, C.CART_SEQ, C.PSEQ, C.GSEQ, C.MYCOUNT, C.OSEQ, P.PRODUCT_SEQ, P.TITLE, P.SUBTITLE, P.CONTENT, P.PCOUNT, P.PRICE, P.PLACE, P.THUMBNAIL, P.FSEQ, P.WDATE, P.DEL, P.TNAME, P.PPOINT, P.HCOUNT FROM ORDERED O, CART C, PRODUCT P WHERE O.ORDERED_SEQ = C.OSEQ AND C.PSEQ = P.PRODUCT_SEQ AND O.OMID=#{omid}
mapper.insert:
SELECT SEQ_GOODS.NEXTVAL AS goods_seq FROM DUAL
INSERT INTO GOODS( GOODS_SEQ,GPSEQ,GCSEQ,GID,GCONTENT, GPOINT,GDATE,GTNAME,PICTURES) VALUES( SEQ_GOODS.CURRVAL,#{gpseq},#{gcseq},#{gid},#{gcontent}, #{gpoint},SYSDATE,'GOODS',#{pictures})
mapper.select: SELECT G.GOODS_SEQ,G.GPSEQ,G.GCSEQ,G.GID,G.GCONTENT,G.GPOINT,G.GDATE,G.GTNAME,G.PICTURES FROM GOODS G WHERE GPSEQ=#{gpseq} ORDER BY GDATE DESC
